name: Deathwing the Destroyer
rules: As an additional cost to play, destroy any number of cards you control. You pay 5 less to play Deathwing for each card destroyed this way.;Assault 5;At the start of your turn, target opponent destroys two card he control.
flavour: The sun has set on this mortal world, fools. Make peace with your end, for the Hour of Twilight falls!

name: Favor of Undeath
rules: Attach to target friendly ally.;Ongoing: Attached ally has Assault 2.;When attached ally is destroyed, target opposing ally has -1 [Health] this turn.

name: Twisted Death Pact
rules: As an additional cost to play this ability, destroy an ability, ally, or equipment you control.;Put a 3 [Melee]/ 3 [Health] Ghoul ally token into play.
flavour: Your death will be only temporary. - Kavar the Bloodthirsty

name: Obsidia
rules: This ally has +1 / +1 for each other Black and Twilight Dragonkin you control.
flavour: My clutch is the last...

name: Yazli Earthspark
rules: When this ally attacks, she may deal 2 nature damage to target hero.

name: Gordash Firetooth
flavour: Burn before the might of the Horde!

name: Gollom Skybang
rules: When this ally is destroyed, you may turn target face-up resource face down.

name: Gerwixicks
rules: When an ally you control deals fire ([Fire]) damage, your hero has Assault 1 this turn.
flavour: Do I ever have a deal for you!

name: Gavin Haverston
rules: This ally has Ferocity and Long-Range while an opponent controls more allies than you. (This ally can attack immediately, and when he attacks, defenders deal no combat damage to him.)

name: Falixia Frizzleblast
rules: Elusive (This ally can't be attacked.)

name: Dagax the Butcher
rules: Ferocity, Stealth;This ally can attack only heroes. At the end of your turn, destroy this ally.
flavour: Sleep with one eye open!

name: Dark Simulacrum
rules: Play target ability in an opposing graveyard immediately without paying its cost.
flavour: Your magic will serve me well. - Dragonslayer Drux

name: Maurice Steelson
rules: Protector;When this ally enters play, your hero and allies you control have Assault 1 this turn.
flavour: Stand together, brothers and sisters!

name: Wild Growth
rules: Restoration Talent (You can't put Balance Talents or Feral Talents in your deck.);Your hero heal all damage from each ally you control. Then, this ability enters play with a growth counter for each ally healed this way.;Ongoing: Your hero has Mend 1 for each growth counter on this ability.

name: Knight Karia
rules: Protector (This ally may exhaust to become the defender when an opposing hero or ally attacks.)

name: Amah the Sun's Grace
rules: FRONT: 4 -> Flip Amah;BACK: At the start of your turn, Amah may heal 1 damage from herself and 1 damage from target ally.
flavour: Even in the darkest of times, the sun will always rise to begin a new day.

name: Amaxi the Cruel
rules: FRONT: 4 -> Flip Amaxi;BACK: If an opposing ally would be destroyed by fatal damage, you may remove it from the game instead.
flavour: Even the Life-Binder knows that sometimes the only answer is to purge all evil in a cleansing bath of flames.

name: Kelsa Wildfire
rules: Ferocity (This ally can attack immediately.)
flavour: Beware the raging fury of flames!

name: Beacon of Light
rules: Holy Talent (You can't put Protection Talents or Retribution Talents in you deck.);Attach to target ally.;Ongoing: When damage is healed from a hero or ally you control, add that many light counters to this ability.;Attached ally has +1 / +1 for each light counter on this ability.

name: Camouflage
rules: Ongoing: On your turn: 2, [Exhaust] -> Remove target ally you control from the game. If you do, put it into play under your control at the end of the next opponent's turn.
flavour: Know your environment... feel your environment... be your environment... - Zane the Sniper

name: Chaos Bolt
rules: Destruction Talent (You can't put Affliction Talents or Demonology Talents in your deck.);Reveal the top card of target opponent's deck and remove it from the game. If it's an ability, ally, or equipment, your hero deals shadow damage to that opponent's hero equal to the cost of that revealed card, and you may play it this turn. (Pay costs as normal.)

name: Demonic Corruption
rules: When the next opposing ally enters play this turn, put a token copy of that ally into play under your control. That copy is also a Demon.
flavour: The overwhelming desire for power can corrupt even those who claim to be pure. - Soul-Eater Morgania

name: Kalan Howland
rules: When this ally is destroyed, target player discards a card.

name: Flame Orb
rules: Attach to target opposing hero.;Ongoing: At the start of your turn, add an ember counter to this ability, and your hero deals 1 fire damage to attached hero. Then, you may destroy this ability. If you do, your hero deals 1 fire damage to target hero or ally for each ember counter that was on this ability.

name: Glaciate
rules: Target opposing ally can't attack this turn.;Draw a card.

name: Inner Will
rules: You pay X less to play your next card this turn, where X is the highest cost among abilities, allies, and equipment you control.
flavour: We must act swiftly and decisively. - Suncaller Haruh

name: Living Roots
rules: Attach to target ally.;Ongoing: Attached ally can't attack or exhaust unless its controller pays 2.
flavour: The limbs of the wild will return you to the earth. - Jasmia, Nature's Chosen

name: Master Marksman
rules: Marksmanship Talent (You can't put Beast Mastery or Survival Talents in your deck.);Ongoing: Your hero has Ranged Dual Wield.;Ranged weapons you control have +1 ATK, and you pay 1 less to strike with them.

name: Necrotic Strike
rules: You pay 3 less to play this ability if an opposing hero or ally was healed this turn.;Your hero deals 3 shadow damage to target hero or ally.

name: Nomak the Blazingclaw
rules: FRONT: 4 -> Flip Nomak;BACK: When Nomak deals [Fire] damage for the first time on each of your turns, allies you control have Assault 1 this turn.
flavour: There are those who fear the raw power of the inferno, bit I choose to embrace it.

name: Power Word: Barrier
rules: Discipline Talent (You can't put Holy Talents or Shadow Talents in your deck.);This ability enters play with two bubble counters on it.;Ongoing: If a hero or ally you control would be dealt damage, remove a bubble counter from this ability. If you do, prevent that damage. Then, if no bubble counters remain, destroy this ability.

name: Revealing Strike
rules: Combat Talent (You can't put Assassination Talents or Subtlety Talents in your deck.);Target opponent reveals the top card of his deck, and then he reveals his hand and discards all cards that share a card type with the revealed card.

name: Riptide
rules: Restoration Talent (You can't put Elemental Talents or Enhancement Talents in your deck.);Your hero heals 5 damage from target hero or ally. Then, this ability enters play with a tide counter for each damage healed this way.;Ongoing: [Exhaust], Remove a tide counter from this ability -> Target hero or ally has Assault 1 this turn. If no tide counters remain, destroy this ability.

name: Smoke Bomb
rules: Ongoing: Opposing heroes and allies attack at random.;Opponents pay 2 more to play abilities that target a hero or ally you control.

name: Wild Mushroom
rules: This ability enters play with three fungus counters.;Ongoing: At the start of your turn, remove a fungus counter form this ability. If none remain, destroy this ability. If you do, your hero deals 5 nature damage to target hero, plus an additional 5 for each other ability named Wild Mushroom you control.

name: Auralyn the Light of Dawn
rules: FRONT: 4 -> Flip Auralyn;BACK: Mend 2 (At the start of your turn, Auralyn may heal 2 damage from target hero or ally.)
flavour: We must remain true to the Light, for it will not forsake us as we stand against the Twilight's Hammer.

name: Bladesinger Alyssa
rules: FRONT: 5 -> Flip Alyssa;BACK: When Alyssa deals combat damage to an ally, she also deals that much melee damage to target hero in that ally's party.
flavour: There will be time for peace eventually but not until I witness the last flicker of life fade from the eyes of Deathwing.

name: Deragor the Earthsworn
rules: FRONT: 6 -> Flip Deragor;BACK: At the start of your turn, target up to three heroes and/or allies. Deragor heals 3, 2, and 1 damage from them, respectively.
flavour: The whisper of the elements has become a roar, lad. It's clear now what they seek.

name: Jasmia, Nature's Chosen
rules: FRONT: 4 -> Flip Jasmia;BACK: When an ally enters play under your control, Jasmia may heal all damage from another target ally.

name: Kavar the Bloodthirsty
rules: FRONT: 4 -> Flip Kavar;BACK: At the start of your turn, you may exhaust target card.
flavour: Come, brothers and sisters! Let us visit brand of savage brutality upon Deathwing himself.

name: Soul-Eater Morgania
rules: FRONT: 2 -> Flip Morgania;BACK: When an opposing ally is destroyed, Morgania heals 1 damage from herself.
flavour: Do you dare taste the precious essence of life?

name: Trilik the Light's Spark
rules: FRONT: 4 -> Flip Trilik;BACK: You pay 1 less to play your first ally each turn.
flavour: The Light will not stand by idly as Deathwing attempts to destroy all life on Azeroth.

name: Vad of the Four Winds
rules: FRONT: 4 -> Flip Vad;BACK: At the end of your turn, you may ready Vad.
flavour: Fear in the face of death is inevitable, but we must not stop until the Twilight menace is obliterated.

name: Zane the Sniper
rules: FRONT: 2 -> Flip Zane;BACK: You pay 1 less to strike with Ranged weapons.
flavour: Once you're in my sights, you're as good as dead.

name: Dar'thael the Bloodsworn
rules: FRONT: 4 -> Flip Dar'thael;BACK: Protector (Dar'thael may exhaust to become the defender when an opposing hero or ally attacks.)
flavour: Deathwing's betrayal has brought suffering to countless innocents.

name: Dragonslayer Drux
rules: FRONT: 4 -> Flip Drux;BACK: When an opposing ally is destroyed, Drux may deal 1 frost damage to target hero.
flavour: I can only imagine the riches and rewards that will come to me once I draw the last breath of life from Deathwing's chest.

name: Earthseer Nakza
rules: FRONT: 4 -> Flip Nakza;BACK: At the start of your turn, Nakza may heal all damage from target ally you control.
flavour: In times, the earth will heal the wounds that Deathwing has created, but if we don't stop his destruction, then that precious time may never come.

name: Flame Keeper Rizzli
rules: FRONT: 5 -> Flip Rizzli;BACK: At the start of your turn, Rizzli may deal fire damage to target hero or ally equal to the ATK of a [Fire] ally you control.
flavour: Seeing the Firelord before my eyes only makes my passion for flame burn even brighter.

name: Samael the Bloodpoint
rules: FRONT: 2 -> Flip Samael;BACK: Ranged weapons you control have Assault 1. (They have +1 ATK on your turn.)
flavour: I will follow the Dark Lady down whatever path she chooses, whether it be in the direction of the Warchief or not.

name: Sumi'jin, Guardian of Cenarius
rules: FRONT: 3 -> Flip Sumi'jin;BACK: When an ally enters play under your control, Sumi'jin may heal 1 damage from herself.
flavour: We can't stand against da Firelord and Deathwing alone, mon. We must seek da aid of da Ancionts to return order to da world.

name: Suncaller Haruh
rules: FRONT: 2 -> Flip Haruh;BACK: (Haruh has +5 [Health])
flavour: Have the lave pools of Deepholm tempered the scales of Deathwing to withstand the searing light of the sun?

name: Zazel the Greedy
rules: FRONT: 6 -> Flip Zazel;BACK: Assault 2 (Zazel has +2 ATK on your turn.)
flavour: If you want to put all your eggs in one basket, I'll just have to make sure that I'm that basket.

name: Black Death
rules: Attach to target opposing hero.;Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 shadow damage to attached hero, or 2 if there are no allies in its party.

name: Frozen Core
rules: Attach to target ally.;Ongoing: Attached ally has -2 / -2.
flavour: A frozen heart is as good as a dead heart. - Kavar the Bloodthirsty

name: Glacial Strike
rules: Your hero deals 5 frost damage to target ally.
flavour: Your pain will be blissfully numbing. - Dragonslayer Drux

name: Hungering Cold
rules: Frost Talent (You can't put Blood Talents or Unholy Talents in your deck.);Ongoing: When an opposing hero or ally exhausts, your hero deals 1 frost damage to it.

name: Favor of Nature
rules: Attach to target friendly ally.;Ongoing: Attached ally has Assault 2.;When attached ally is destroyed, put two 1 [Melee] / 1 [Health] Treant ally tokens into play.

name: Fierce Cat Form
rules: Target ally has Assult 2 this turn.;Ongoing: Your hero has Assault 1.
flavour: Those blasted druids never seem to run out of tricks! - Deragor the Earthsworn

name: Rebirth
rules: Put target ally card from your graveyard into play if its costs is less than or equal to the number of resources you control.
flavour: Feel da essence of life and return to da fray, mon. - Sumi'jin, Guardian of Cenarius

name: Tears of Aessina
rules: Your hero heals 2 damage from each of up to two target heroes and/or allies.
flavour: Da wounded forests of Hyjal done brought even da ancients to tears. - Sumi'jin, Guardian of Cenarius

name: Twisted Wrath
rules: As an additional cost to play this ability, destroy an ability, ally, or equipment you control.;Your hero deals 5 nature damage to target hero.
flavour: When pushed to the brink, even the wild will make a necessary sacrifice for the greater good. - Jasmia, Nature's Chosen

name: Cinder
rules: At the start of your turn, this ally may deal 1 fire damage to target hero or ally.
flavour: Leave nothing but their ashes! - Zane the Sniper

name: Disengage
rules: Remove target attacker from combat, and your hero deals 1 ranged damage to it.
flavour: You'll need a longer blade than that if you ever want to hit me. - Samael the Bloodpoint

name: Explosive Hunt
rules: Your hero deals 8 fire damage to target Demon, Dragonkin, or Elemental ally.
flavour: Know your enemy before you rush into battle. - Samael the Bloodpoint

name: Favor of the Hunt
rules: Attach to target friendly ally.;Ongoing: Attached ally has Assault 2.;When attached ally is destroyed, your hero deals 2 fire damage to target hero or ally.

name: Immolation Trap
rules: Trap (You may exhaust your defending hero rather than pay this card's cost.);Attach to target attacking hero or ally.;Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 2 fire damage to attached character.
reprinted: Through the Dark Portal,Through the Dark Portal (EA)

name: Nag the Twisted
rules: As an additional cost to play this ally, destroy an ability, ally, or equipment you control.;When this ally enters play, you may destroy target ally or equipment with cost 4 or more.

name: Blazing Debris
rules: Your hero deals 3 fire damage to each of up to two heroes and/or allies.
flavour: When in doubt, light something on fire and hurl it at your target. - Flame Keeper Rizzik

name: Favor of the Arcane
rules: Attach to target friendly ally.;Ongoing: Attached ally has Assault 2.;When attached ally is destroyed, draw a card.

name: Fireball
rules: Attach to target hero or ally, and your hero deals 4 fire damage to it.;Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 fire damage to attached character.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Assault on Icecrown Citadel,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),Class Starter Deck 2010

name: Pyromaniac
rules: Fire Talent (You can't put Arcane Talents or Frost Talents in your deck.);You pay 1 less to play this ability for each [Fire] card you control.;You hero deals 10 fire damage to target hero or ally.

name: Ring of Frost
rules: Your hero deals 2 frost damage to each ready opposing ally.
flavour: Be still, even for just a moment. - Nomak the Blazingclaw

name: Twisted Arcana
rules: As an additional cost to play this ability, destroy an ability, ally, or equipment you control.;Draw two cards.
flavour: If you are willing, the arcane will feed even your most twisted desires. - Flame Keeper Rizzli

name: Blessing of Might
rules: Attach to target hero or ally.;Ongoing: Attached character has +1 ATK while attacking.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring)
flavour: May the Light bless you with all the strength you will ever need. - Amah the Sun's Grace

name: Favor of the Light
rules: Attach to target friendly ally.;Ongoing: Attached ally has Assault 2.;When attached ally is destroyed, your hero heals 5 damage from target hero or ally.

name: Guardian of Ancient Kings
rules: While you control a Holy ability, this ally has Mend 2.;While you control a Protection ability, this ally has Protector.;While you control a Retribution ability, this ally has Assault 2.

name: Hammer of Retribution
rules: Exhaust up to three target heroes and/or allies.
flavour: Justice has come, and you will not escape your judgment - Auralyn the Light of Dawn

name: Hand of Protection
rules: The next time target ally would be dealt damage this turn, prevent it.
flavour: You may not serve the Light, but it will still offer you its protection. - Auralyn the Light of Dawn

name: Twisted Light
rules: As an additional cost to play this ability, destroy an ability, ally, or equipment you control.;Prevent the next 3 damage that target firendly hero or ally would be dealt this turn.;Your hero deals 3 unpreventable holy damage to target opposing hero or ally.

name: Word of Glory
rules: Ongoing: Your hero has Protector and Mend 1.
flavour: Give your faith to the sun and bask in the warmth that it provides. - Amah the Sun's Grace

name: Favor of Spirit
rules: Attach to target friendly ally.;Ongoing: Attached ally has Assault 2.;When attached ally is destroyed, you may destroy target ability.

name: Heal
rules: Your hero heals 7 damage from target hero or ally.
flavour: Bask in the warmth and feel your wounds fade away. - Suncaller Haruh

name: Holy Blaze
rules: Your hero deals 4 unpreventable holy damage to each of up to two target allies.
flavour: Your pain will last but a moment longer. - Trilik the Light's Spark

name: Power Word: Absorb
rules: The next time damage would be dealt to target hero or ally this turn, prevent it. Draw a card.
flavour: I will buy you but a moment. The rest is up to you. - Suncaller Haruh

name: Psychic Melt
rules: Target opponent chooses and destroys an ally he controls.
flavour: When I'm through with you, nothing will be left but an empty husk. - Trilik the Light's Spark

name: Twisted Mind Spike
rules: As an additional cost to play this ability, destroy an ability, ally, or equipment you control.;Your hero deals 3 shadow damage to target ally. Then, its controller discards a card.

name: Break Steel
rules: Destroy target exhausted equipment. If you do, your hero deals 2 melee damage to its controller's hero.
flavour: If you beg, I might spare you any more humiliation. - Zazel the Greedy

name: Mind-Numbing Poison
rules: Attach to target hero that was dealt combat damage by your hero this turn.;Ongoing: At the start of attached hero's controller's turn, that player exhausts a ready resource he controls.

name: Favor of Mischief
rules: Attach to target friendly ally.;Ongoing: Attached ally has Assault 2.;When attached ally is destroyed, target opponent discards a card.

name: Swindle
rules: Ready and gain control of target opposing equipment until end of turn.
flavour: What's mine is mine, and what's yours is mine. - Zazel the Greedy

name: Twisted Massacre
rules: As an additional cost to play this ability, destroy an ability, ally, or equipment you control.;Destroy all exhausted opposing allies.
flavour: Death comes for us all. - Bladesinger Alyssa

name: Vicious Strike
rules: Your hero deals 3 melee damage to target ally with cost 4 or less.
flavour: If you know what's good for you, you'll stay out of my way. - Bladesinger Alyssa

name: Burning Winds
rules: If you control one or more non-token [Fire] allies, put an X [Fire] / X [Health] Fire Elemental ally token into play, where X is the highest cost among [Fire] allies you control.;If you control one or more non-token [Nature] allies, put an X [Nature] / X [Health] Air Elemental ally token into play, where X is the highest cost among [Nature] allies you control.

name: Cleanse Spirit
rules: Destroy target ability. If you do, your hero heals 3 damage from target hero or ally.
flavour: There are times when the body, mind, and spirit must all be cured of what ails them, lad. - Deragor the Earthsworn

name: Favor of the Elements
rules: Attach to target friendly ally.;Ongoing: Attached ally has Assault 2.;When attached ally is destroyed, your hero deals 3 fire damage to target hero.

name: Flametongue Weapon
rules: Attach to target Melee weapon you control.;Ongoing: When you strike with attached weapon, your hero deals 1 fire damage to target hero or ally.

name: Inferno Totem
rules: At the start of your turn, this Totem deals 4 fire damage to target opposing hero.
flavour: It takes just one spark to ignite an overwhelming inferno. - Earthseer Nakza

name: Primal Strike
rules: Target ally or weapon has +3 ATK this turn.
flavour: The rush of the elements will prove to be move than enough to get the job done. - Earthseer Nakza

name: Twisted Fire Nova
rules: As an additional cost to play this ability, destroy an ability, ally, or equipment you control.;Your hero deals 7 fire damage divided as you choose to any number of target heroes and/or allies.

name: Favor of the Nether
rules: Attach to target friendly ally.;Ongoing: Attached ally has Assault 2.;When attached ally is destroyed, your hero deals 1 fire damage to each opposing hero and ally.

name: Fel Immolation
rules: Attach to target hero, and your hero deals 2 fire damage to it.;Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 2 fire damage to attached hero.

name: Incinerate
rules: Your hero deals 2 fire damage to target hero or ally, or 4 if your hero dealt fire damage with an ability to that character this turn.
flavour: I smell something burning. - Amaxi the Cruel

name: Selora
rules: Elusive (This ally can't be attacked.);When this ally enters play, target ally has +1 / -1 this turn.

name: Twisted Infernal
rules: As an additional cost to play this ally, destroy an ability, ally, or equipment you control.;Ferocity (This ally can attack immediately.)
flavour: Ah, finally, my support has arrived. - Amaxi the Cruel

name: Void Rip
rules: Remove target ally from the game.
flavour: I will suffer your presence no longer. - Soul-Eater Morgania

name: Colossus Smash
rules: Put a 5 [Melee] / 5 [Health] Colossus Warrior ally token into play.;Ongoing: Whenever an ally you control with 5 or more ATK is destroyed, you may destroy target equipment.

name: Demoralizing Strike
rules: Target ally or weapon has -3 ATK this turn.
flavour: Your effort is equal parts commendable and pointless. - Dar'thael the Bloodsworn

name: Executioner's Mark
rules: Attach to target ally.;Ongoing: When attached ally is dealt damage, destroy it.
flavour: You will find relief in death. - Vad of the Four Winds

name: Favor of Steel
rules: Attach to target friendly ally.;Ongoing: Attached ally has Assault 2.;When attached ally is destroyed, you may destroy target equipment.

name: Heroic Leap
rules: Exhaust up to two target heroes and/or allies. Your hero deals 1 melee damage to each character exhausted this way.
flavour: Hiyyaaaahhh! - Fraznak the Furious

name: Shockwave
rules: Protection Talent (You can't put Arms Talents or Fury Talents in your deck.);Put target ally on top of its owner's deck. your hero deals melee damage equal to that ally's cost to its controller's hero.

name: Slam
rules: Your hero deals melee damage to target hero or ally equal to 1 plus the ATK of a Melee weapon you control
flavour: Pray you aren't the target. - Amah the Sun's Grace

name: Twisted Rampage
rules: As an additional cost to play this ability, destroy an ability, ally, or equipment you control.;Ready your hero and all Melee weapons you control. Melee weapons you control have +2 ATK, and you pay 2 less to strike with them this turn.

name: Frozen Frenzy
rules: Allies you control have Assault 6 this turn.
flavour: There's no stopping them once they fix their gaze on you. - Suncaller Haruh

name: Council of Three Hammers
rules: Put a 5 [Melee] / 5 [Health] Dwarf Warrior ally token named Muradin Bronzebeard with Protector and Muradin (1), a 5 [Holy] / 5 [Health] Dwarf Priest ally token named Moira Thaurissan with Mend 5 and Moira (1), and a 5 [Nature] / 5 [Health] Dwarf High Thane ally token named Falstad Wildhammer with Ferocity and Falstad (1) into play.

name: Fool's Gold
rules: Ongoing: At the end of your turn, each opponent draws a card.;On your turn: Destroy another ability, ally or equipment you control -> Target player gains control of this ability.

name: Alrak Stonecrack
rules: When this ally is destroyed, put target opposing ally into its owner's hand.

name: Abbie Whizzleblade
rules: When this ally enters play, target hero or ally has +1 ATK and a second target ally or ally has -1 ATK this turn.;(received errata)

name: Obsidian Enforcer
rules: When this or another Black or Twilight Dragonkin ally you control is destroyed, you may destroy target [Horde] or [Alliance] ally.
flavour: Once blessed with the powers of the earth, the black dragonflight now possess the power of fire and magma.

name: Blood Knight Adrenna
rules: Protector;When this ally is destroyed, prevent all damage that would be dealt to target ally you control this turn.

name: Blade of the Burning Sun
rules: [Exhaust], Exhaust your hero -> Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a [Fire] ally or equipment, your allies have Assault X this turn, where X is the cost of the reavealed card.
flavour: Rajh fell to my hand, and with his demise, I took the blade that was imbued with his power - Nomak the Blazingclaw

name: Thrall, Guardian of the Elements
rules: You pay 8 less to play this ally if you control each of the following: [Fire] card, [Frost] card, [Melee] card, [Nature] card.;Other abilities, allies, and equipment you control can't be destroyed.
flavour: You will die this day, Earthwarder!

name: Flamebringer Gaxix
rules: This ally has +2 / +2 while you control another [Fire] card.

name: Lord Darius Crowley
rules: Aberration;When this ally enters play, you may howl. If you do, put three 1 [Melee] / 1 [Health] Worgen ally tokens into play with Ferocity.

name: Obsidian Skyterror
rules: When this or another Black or Twilight Dragonkin ally you control is destroyed, you may destroy target Dragonkin ally.
flavour: Alexstrasza is seeking to save the black dragonflight by purifying them of their corruption and madness.

name: Obsidian Pyrewing
rules: When this or another Black or Twilight Dragonkin ally you control is destroyed, you may destroy target face-up resource.
flavour: Nefarian and Onyxia attempted to lead the black dragonflight while Deathwing hid away in Deepholm.

name: Obsidian Drudge
rules: When this or another Black or Twilight Dragonkin ally you control is destroyed, you may destroy target equipment.
flavour: Deathwing desires to enslave Alexstrasza and destroy the red dragonflight.

name: Banok Sunrock
rules: Protector (This ally may exhaust to become the defender when an opposing hero or ally attacks.)

name: Azizi Daggerflick
rules: Time is Money (This ally may use [Exhaust] powers immediately.);[Exhaust] -> Exhaust target ally with cost 4 or less.
flavour: You are most certainly useless.

name: Windspeaker Nuvu
rules: When this ally attacks for the first time each turn, ready him.
flavour: A flurry of steel is all the Twilight's Hammer will see!

name: Vakus the Inferno
rules: Aberration, Ferocity;This ally can attack only heroes.;At the end of your turn, destroy this ally.
flavour: I will leave a trail of destruction in my wake!

name: Tania Falan
rules: When this ally enters play, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.
flavour: Even the slightest bit of knowledge contains immense power.

name: Stacia Markton
rules: When this ally enters play, target hero or ally you control has Long-Range this turn.

name: Chandra Marlight
rules: Aberration (Prevent all non-combat damage that would be dealt to this ally.);Mend 2 (At the start of your turn, this ally may heal 2 damage from target hero or ally.)

name: Prince Anduin Wrynn
rules: Other friendly Humans can protect this ally. ;Other friendly allies have +1 / +1 for each different card type you control.
flavour: We'll get to the bottom of this.

name: Mr. Goldmine's Wild ride
rules:
Pay (6) to complete this quest.

Reward: Reveal the top three cards of your deck. You may put any number of revealed cards with different card types into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.
flavour: Why walk when we can ride in style? - Initiate Goldmine

name: Elementium Poleaxe
rules: [Exhaust] -> Your hero has Assault 1 this turn for each token ally you control.
flavour: Elementium possesses traits unlike any other metal on Azeroth. - Zane the Sniper

name: Azami'tal the Flamebender
rules: When this ally enters play, he deals X fire damage to target hero or ally, where X is the cost of another [Fire] ally or equipment you control.;;Stash: If an opposing non-hero card would be destroyed this turn, remove it from the game instead.

name: Blackout
rules: On your turn: Pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Target up two face-up resources. Turn the first face down. If you control a Black or Twilight Dragonkin, turn the second face down.
flavour: The only mercy we have left to offer the black flight is the oblivion that they so passionately pursue. - Liastrasza

name: Jerrak Krandle
rules: Protector(This ally may exhaust to become the defender when an opposing hero or ally attacks.);;Stash(As this enters your resource row, you may have it enter face up. Immediately turn it face down.): Add an heirloom counter to target equipment you control.

name: Abysswalker Rakax
rules: When this ally enters play, he may deal 1 fire damage to target ally. If that ally has fatal damage, remove it from the game.
flavour: The Twisting Nether beckons!

name: Cho'gall
rules: At the start of your turn, destroy an ability, ally or equipment you control.;At the end of your turn, destroy target opposing ability, ally, or equipment.
flavour: ALL falls to chaos. ALL will be destroyed. (Chaos, chaos!)

name: Nefarian
rules: When this ally enters play, put a 8 [Fire] / 8 [Health] Black Dragonkin ally token named Onyxia into play with Onyxia (1)
flavour: Behold, the Broodmother... Onyxia... REBORN.

name: Caelestrasz
rules: Allies you control have +1 / +1 for each Red Dragonkin you control.
flavour: The fires dim, champions. Take this, the last of my power.

name: Twilight Shadowdrake
rules: When this ally enters play, if an ability, ally, or equipment was destroyed this turn, this ally may deal 4 shadow damage to target hero.
flavour: The first twilight dragonkin were capable of feeding on all forms of mystical energy.

name: Obsidian Drakonid
rules: When this or another Black or Twilight Dragonkin ally you control is destroyed, you may destroy target ability.
flavour: My clutch is the last...

name: Zor'dul Deathbinder
rules: Assault 1(This ally has +1 ATK on your turn.);When this ally is destroyed, you may draw a card.
flavour: We will find their weaknesses eventually, and where we do, the Warchied will crush Deathwing and his kin.

name: Lyrana of Eldre'Thalas
rules: When this ally enters play, she deals fire damage to each opposing hero and ally equal to the number of [Fire] cards you control.;;Stash: Fire ([Fire]) damage that your hero and allies you control would deal is unpreventable this turn.

name: Jessa the Lifebound
rules: Protector;When this ally is destroyed, put three 1 [Melee] / 1 [Health] Treant ally tokens into play.
flavour: Life doesn't always end in death.

name: Shalug'doom, the Axe of Unmaking
rules: As this weapon enters play, destroy any number of abilities, allies, and/or equipment you control.;This weapon enters play with a +1 ATK counter on it for each card destroyed this way.
flavour: Behold the destiny of your fragile world! - Cho'gall

name: Corrupted Egg Shell
rules: While you control an Egg ally token, your hero has Protector.;At the end of your turn, put a 0 [Shadow] / 1 [Health] Egg ally token into play.;At the start of your turn, you may destroy this item. If you do, all Egg ally tokens you control become 8 [Shadow] / 8 [Health] Twilight Dragonkin.

name: Gardos Gravefang
rules: Protector (This ally may exhaust to become the defender when an opposing hero or ally attacks.);When this ally is destroyed, you may put target card in a graveyard on the bottom of its owner's deck.
flavour: I will see you buried, one way or another.

name: Stargazer Ronal
rules: When this ally is destroyed, you may shuffle target player's graveyard into his deck.
flavour: We must follow the lead of Cenarius and Malfurion if we hope to stand against the Firelord.

name: Roger Ulric
flavour: I've got your scent now - there's no escape!

name: Javeer
rules: Protector (This ally may exhaust to become the defender when an opposing hero or ally attacks.);When this ally protects for the first time each turn, ready him.
flavour: Kneel before my blade.

name: Haratha Hammerflame
rules: When this ally is destroyed, she may deal 3 fire damage to target opposing hero.
flavour: With each passing day, hope continues to fade, but we must press on if we are to defeat Deathwing.

name: Frizzle Stumbleshade
rules: Untargetable

name: Brel Blazebeard
rules: Elusive (This ally can't be attacked.);When your hero or another ally you control deals fire ([Fire]) damage, this ally has Assault 2 this turn. (He has +2 ATK on your turn.)
flavour: Control your emotions, lad, or the flames will never obey your command.

name: Double Attack Handguards
rules: 3, [Exhaust] -> Target ally has Assault X this turn, where X is its ATK.
flavour: Don't blink - you might miss the excitement. - Zazel the Greedy

name: The Worldbreaker
rules: Pay 8 and turn all other quests you control named The Worldbreaker face down to complete this quest.;Reward: Your hero has Assault 5 and [Fire] ATK this turn. plus an additional Assault 5 this turn for each other quest turned face down this way.
flavour: If you do not stop him, the Earthen Ring will end this day! - Thrall

name: Tattered Dreadmist Mask
rules: If this amor has three or more heirloom counters: [Exhaust] -> Look at the top three cards of your deck. Put one into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.;Stash: Add an heirloom counter to target equipment you control.

name: Commander Molotov
rules: Time is Money;[Exhaust], Destroy another ally you control -> This ally deals fire damage to target hero or ally equal to that destroyed ally's cost.

name: Terrastra
rules: When this or another [Melee] card you control is destroyed, your hero has +1 ATK this turn.;[Melee] allies you own everywhere have Stash: Put a 2 [Melee] / 1 [Health] Earth Elemental ally token into play.
flavour: We will handle them!

name: Battleplate of the Apocalypse
rules: On your turn: [Exhaust] -> When target ally you control deals damage to an opposing ally this turn, destroy both allies.
flavour: Everyone succumbs in the end! - Cho'gall

name: Sinestra
rules: Ferocity;On your turn: Destroy another non-token ability, ally or equipment you control -> Put two 1[Shadow] / 1[Health] Twilight Dragonkin ally tokens into play with ferocity.

name: Twilight Corruptor
rules: When this ally enters play, if an ability, ally, or equipment was destroyed this turn, this ally may deal 2 shadow damage to each opposing hero and ally.
flavour: Twilight dragonkin are usually raised from eggs stolen from other dragonflights, which are then modified through dark magic.

name: Twilight Drake
rules: When this ally enters play, if an ability, ally, or equipment was destroyed this turn, target player discards a card.

name: Twilight Emissary
rules: When this ally enters play, if an ability, ally, or equipment was destroyed this turn, you may put target Death Knight or Shaman ally from your graveyard into your hand.
flavour: The twilight dragonflight were a new breed of dragon created by Sinestra to rule the world.

name: Twilight Wyrmkiller
rules: When this ally enters play, if an ability, ally, or equipment was destroyed this turn, this ally has Ferocity this turn.
flavour: Sinestra continues to create this new brood beneath the Bastion of Twilight.

name: Merithra
rules: When a resource you control is turned face down, this ally deals nature damage to target hero or ally equal to the number of Green Dragonkin you control.
flavour: Succumb to the endless dream, little ones.

name: Arygos
rules: You pay 1 less to play abilities for each Blue Dragonkin you control, to a minimum of 1.
flavour: Let them feel the wrath of the blue flight!

name: Anachronos
rules: At the end of your turn, you may ready a resource you control for each Bronze Dragonkin you control.
flavour: A terrible and costly mistake you have made. It is not my time, mortals.

name: Ignacious
rules: When this or another [Fire] card you control is destroyed, you may turn target resource face down.;[Fire] allies you own everywhere have Stash: Put a 2 [Fire] / 1 [Health] Fire Elemental ally token into play.
flavour: You will die for your insolence!

name: Feludius
rules: When this or another [Frost] card you control is destroyed, you may look at the top card of your deck. If you do, you may put it into your graveyard.;[Frost] allies you own everywhere have Stash: Put a 2 [Frost] / 1 [Health] Water Elemental ally token into play.
flavour: You dare invade our lord's sanctum?

name: Arion
rules: When this or another [Nature] card you control is destroyed, your hero may deal 1 Nature damage to target hero.;[Nature] allies you own everywhere have Stash: Put a 2 [Nature] / 1 [Health] Air Elemental ally token into play.
flavour: Enough of this foolishness!

name: Amani Dragonhawk
rules: As this ally enters play, choose ability, ally, or equipment. Opposing cards of the chosen type lose and can't have powers.

name: Nightsaber Cub
rules: Ferocity (This ally can attack immediately.)

name: Flame Pillar Leggings
rules: At the start of your turn, your hero may deal 1 fire damage to target hero.

name: Polished Helm of Valor
rules: If this armor has three or more heirloom counters: [Exhaust] -> Allies you control have Assault 3 this turn.;;Stash: Add an heirloom card to target equipment you control.

name: Proto-Handler's Gauntlets
rules: As this armor enters play, choose one of the following: Black, Blue, Bronze, Green, Red or Twilight. Dragonkin you control are also the chosen color.

name: Stained Shadowcraft Cap
rules: On your turn, if this armor has three or more heirloom counters: [Exhaust] -> Your hero deals 3 nature damage to target hero or ally. ;;Stash: Add an heirloom card to target equipment you control.

name: Tarnished Raging Berserker's Helm
rules: If this armor has three or more heirloom counters: [Exhaust] -> Ready up to three other target cards you control.;;Stash: Add an heirloom card to target equipment you control.

name: Darkmoon Card: Hurricane
rules: When this item enters or leaves play, your hero deals 1 nature damage to each opposing ally.

name: Akirus the Worm-Breaker
rules: When a Dragonkin ally is destroyed, you may put X +1 ATK counters on this weapon, where X was the ATK of that Dragonkin.
flavour: Those who stand against me will be broken and brought to their kneels - Drux the Dragonslayer

name: Axe of the Eclipse
rules: This weapon has +2 ATK while an opponent controls more allies than you.
flavour: When night and day become one. - Auralyn the Light of Dawn

name: Blade of the Witching Hour
rules: When this weapon enters play, your hero may deal 4 fire damage to target opposing hero or ally.
flavour: Save it for when the time is just right. - Amaxi the Cruel

name: Chelley's Staff of Dark Mending
rules: When an ally you control is destroyed, your hero heals damage from itself equal to that ally's cost.
flavour: Even in the depths of this darkness, we must keep our faith. - Trilik the Light's Spark

name: Claws of Torment
rules: Your hero has Dual Wield. (You can control a second one-handed Melee weapon instead of an Off-Hand equipment. You can strike with a second Melee weapon during the same combat.)

name: Cookie's Stirring Rod
rules: Long-Range;When your hero deals damage with this weapon, reveal the top card of your deck. If it is an [Arcane] card, put it into your hand.

name: Crul'korak, the Lightning's Arc
rules: [Nature] allies you control have Assault X, where X is the ATK of this weapon.
flavour: The sinister energy Nefarion used to raise Onyxia still crackles on the blade. - Earthseer Nakza

name: Darklight Torch
rules: When this weapon is destroyed, you may destroy target ability.

name: Dragonheart Piercer
rules: Long-Range;This weapon has +1 ATK for each different color among dragonkin you control.;(Dragonkin colors are Black, Blue, Bronze, Green, Red and Twilight).
flavour: Even from great distances, its blots always seem to find the heart of my prey. - Samael the Bloodpoint

name: Lava Spine
rules: When this weapon is destroyed, you may destroy target equipment.
flavour: It's as if pure lava flows eternally through the blade. - Dar'thael the Bloodsworn

name: Obsidium Executioner
flavour: Only the most seasoned blacksmiths would be able to craft this fine a blade. - Dar'thael the Bloodsworn

name: Organic Lifeform Inverter
rules: When this weapon is destroyed, you may destroy target ally.
flavour: What was once life, now becomes death. - Bladesinger Alyssa

name: Twilight's Hammer
rules: On your turn: [Exhaust], Exhaust your hero, destroy another ability, ally or equipment you control -> Gain control of target opposing card if it shares a card type with that destroyed card.
flavour: Chaos and madness will consume any who seek to harness its power.

name: Volatile Thunderstick
rules: Long-Range;When you strike with this or another Ranged weapon, your hero deals 1 nature damage to target hero or ally.

name: Battle of Life and Death
rules: You pay 1 less to complete this quest for each damaged hero and ally.;On your turn: Pay 6 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
flavour: Alexstrasza and Deathwing have taken to the skies over Grim Batol! - Calen

name: The Crucible of Carnage: The Twilight Terror
rules: On your turn, if an ability, ally, or equipment was destroyed this turn: Pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
flavour: This guy hails from the Twilight Citadel itself, and comes toting a toasty punch. - Gurgthock

name: Devoured
rules: If all quests you control are named Devoured: Pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
flavour: Iso'rath's body is reacting quickly to our threat. - Earthcaller Yevaa

name: Enter the Dragon Queen
rules: Pay 4 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card for each different color among Dragonkin you control. (Dragonkin colors are Black, Blue, Bronze, Green, Red and Twilight.)
flavour: It saddens me greatly, but my judgment is final. - Alexstrasza the Life-Binder

name: Fire the Cannon
rules: Pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Reveal the top five cards of your deck. Put a revealed [Fire] card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck. (A [Fire] card is a card with [Fire] in its lower-left corner.)
flavour: My arch-nemesis, Lord Cannon, has foolishly decided to throw his allegiance to the Twilight's Hammer. - Countess Verrall

name: A Fiery Reunion
rules: If a hero or ally you controlled dealt fire ([Fire]) damage this turn: Pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
flavour: That's Magmatooth, my estranged fire elemental. You gotta kill him or he's gonna kill me! - Initiate Goldmine

name: Last of Her Kind
rules: Pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Put target Dragonkin from your graveyard into your hand.
flavour: Obsidia is one of the last mature dragons that can continue the black dragonflight bloodline. - Baleflame

name: The Maw of Iso'rath
rules: If three or more allies you controlled dealt damage this turn: Pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
flavour: Hold steady until an opportunity presents itself, then join the battle with the rest of the shaman in cutting the tentacles down. - Earthcaller Torunscar

name: Mercy for the Bound
rules: On your turn, if a [Fire], [Frost], [Melee] or [Nature] ally entered play under your control this turn: Pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
flavour: The elementals are without hope, but in this sacrifice they can extract their revenge. - Earthcaller Yevaa

name: Twilight Extermination
rules: On your turn: Destroy an ability, ally, or equipment you control and pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
flavour: USE... THE ELEMENTAL'S POWERS... TO DESTROY... THE TWILIGHT DEVOTEES... AND... THEIR... FACELESS OVERSEERS. - L'ghorek

name: Unbinding
rules: On your turn: Pay 1 to complete this quest.;Reward: Look at the top card of target opponent's deck. You may remove that card from the game or leave it on top.
flavour: Let me tell you, they don't appreciate being enslaved one bit! - Initiate Goldmine

name: Far from the Nest
rules: On your turn: Pay 6 to complete this quest.;Reward: Put target ally with cost 3 or less from your graveyard into play.
flavour: Recover the eggs. Bring them back to me. - Lirastrasza

name: Twilight Citadel
rules: On your turn: Pay 1, [Exhaust] -> Put a 1 [Shadow] / 1 [Health] Twilight Dragonkin ally token into play.
flavour: The great fortress of the Twilight's Hammer, which houses the Bastion of Twilight deep within.

name: High Chieftain Baine Bloodhoof
rules: Protector;Prevent all damage that would be dealt to this ally while you control another [Horde] ally.
flavour: Even in the darkest hour, we will hold our heads high and honor the Earthmother in all we do.

name: High Guard Braxx
rules: Protector (This ally may exhaust to become the defender when opposing hero or ally attacks.);When this ally enters play, he may deal 2 melee damage to target damaged hero or ally.
flavour: It takes more than just brawn to get through life, kid.

name: Jaga'zul the Wild's Fury
rules: When this ally is destroyed, you may put him from the graveyard into his owner's resource row face down and exhausted.
flavour: Good things never go to waste, bruddah.

name: Kraxos Chizzlecoin
rules: Assault 3 (This ally has +3 ATK on your turn.);;Stash (As this enters your resource row,you may have it enter face up. Immediately turn it face down.): Add an heirloom counter to target equipment you control.

name: Kyroth Steelspite
rules: Protector (This ally may exhaust to become the defender when an opposing hero or ally attacks.);Opponents can't strike with weapons.
flavour: I think I'm going to get along with the new Warchief just fine...

name: Rakala Deathsmash
rules: When this ally is destroyed, target opposing ally has -3 ATK this turn.
flavour: Even in undeath, I fight for the Horde!

name: Sahama Brighthorn
rules: When this ally is destroyed, your hero may heal 4 damage from target hero or ally.

name: Shade Emissary Vaxxod
rules: Time is Money; [Exhaust] -> This ally deals 2 shadow damage to target ally and 2 shadow damage to itself.
flavour: There comes a time in every goblin's life when he's just gotta up his sleeves and get down to business.

name: Warchief Garrosh Hellscream
rules: When another [Horde] ally enters play under your control, it has Assault 2 and Ferocity, and At the end of your turn, destroy this ally.
flavour: You will serve the Horde... or be crushed beneath it!

name: Wildweaver Masa'zun
rules: When this ally enters play, she heals 3 damage from each hero and ally you control.
flavour: Deathwing gonna keep tryin' to destroy all life, mon, but we gotta dig in and stand our ground.

name: Nightsaber Cub
rules: Ferocity (This ally can attack immediately.)

name: Fool's Gold
rules: Ongoing: At the end of your turn, each opponent draws a card.;On your turn: Destroy another ability, ally or equipment you control -> Target player gains control of this ability.

name: Amani Dragonhawk
rules: As this ally enters play, choose ability, ally, or equipment. Opposing cards of the chosen type lose and can't have powers.

name: Deathwing the Destroyer
rules: As an additional cost to play, destroy any number of cards you control. You pay 5 less to play Deathwing for each card destroyed this way.;Assault 5;At the start of your turn, target opponent destroys two card he control.
flavour: The sun has set on this mortal world, fools. Make peace with your end, for the Hour of Twilight falls!
